name: QEII Diagnostic Imaging
description: Comprehensive imaging services including X-ray, CT, MRI, and ultrasound.
location: Multiple buildings at QEII Health Sciences Centre
referral_info: Physician referral required for most imaging
hours: Monday to Friday, 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM (emergency imaging 24/7)
parking_info: Limited on-site parking available. Public parking nearby.
public_transit: Accessible by Halifax Transit bus routes.
